item.title: Customers who never order
item.description: Here is the link to the problem: Customers who never order. Problem Statement: Table: Customers +————-+———+ | Column Name | Type | +————-+———+ | id | int | | name | varchar | +————-+———+ id is the primary key (column with unique values) for this table. Each row of this table indicates the ID and name of a customer. Table: Orders +————-+——+ | Column Name | Type | +————-+——+ | id | int | | customerId | int | +————-+——+ id is the primary key (column with unique values) for this table.
